Package mindustry.game

package mindustry.game
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Objectives.Objective
    Defines a specific objective for a game.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    EventType
     
    EventType.BlockBuildBeginEvent
    Called when block building begins by placing down the ConstructBlock.
    EventType.BlockBuildEndEvent
     
    EventType.BlockDestroyEvent
    Called right before a block is destroyed.
    EventType.BlockInfoEvent
    Called when the player opens info for a specific block.
    EventType.BuildSelectEvent
    Called when a player or drone begins building something.
    EventType.ClientCreateEvent
     
    EventType.ClientLoadEvent
    Called when the client game is first loaded.
    EventType.ClientPreConnectEvent
     
    EventType.CommandIssueEvent
     
    EventType.ConfigEvent
    Called when the player configures a specific building.
    EventType.ConnectionEvent
    Called when a connection is established to a client.
    EventType.ConnectPacketEvent
    Called when a player sends a connection packet.
    EventType.ContentInitEvent
    Called *after* all content has been initialized.
    EventType.CoreChangeEvent
    Called when a core block is placed/removed or its team is changed.
    EventType.CoreItemDeliverEvent
    Called when a core receives ammo, but only when the tutorial is active!
    EventType.DepositEvent
    Called when a player deposits items to a block.
    EventType.DisposeEvent
     
    EventType.FileTreeInitEvent
    Called *after* all the modded files have been added into Vars.tree
    EventType.GameOverEvent
     
    EventType.LaunchItemEvent
     
    EventType.LineConfirmEvent
    Called when the player places a line, mobile or desktop.
    EventType.LoseEvent
     
    EventType.MapMakeEvent
     
    EventType.MapPublishEvent
     
    EventType.MenuOptionChooseEvent
    Consider using Menus.registerMenu instead.
    EventType.PickupEvent
     
    EventType.PlayerBanEvent
     
    EventType.PlayerChatEvent
     
    EventType.PlayerConnect
    Called when a player connects, but has not joined the game yet.
    EventType.PlayerIpBanEvent
     
    EventType.PlayerIpUnbanEvent
     
    EventType.PlayerJoin
    Called after connecting; when a player receives world data and is ready to play.

    EventType.PlayerUnbanEvent

    EventType.SectorCaptureEvent
    Called when a sector is conquered, e.g.
    EventType.SectorInvasionEvent
    Called when a sector is destroyed by waves when you're not there.
    EventType.SectorLaunchEvent
     
    EventType.SectorLoseEvent
    Called when a sector is destroyed by waves when you're not there.
    EventType.ServerLoadEvent
     
    EventType.StateChangeEvent
     
    EventType.TapEvent
    Called when a player taps any tile.
    EventType.TileChangeEvent
    Called *after* a tile has changed.
    EventType.TilePreChangeEvent
    Called *before* a tile has changed.
    EventType.TurnEvent
     
    EventType.TurretAmmoDeliverEvent
    Called when a turret receives ammo, but only when the tutorial is active!
    EventType.UnitChangeEvent
     
    EventType.UnitControlEvent
     
    EventType.UnitCreateEvent
    Called when a unit is created in a reconstructor or factory.
    EventType.UnitDestroyEvent
     
    EventType.UnitDrownEvent
     
    EventType.UnitUnloadEvent
    Called when a unit is dumped from any payload block.
    EventType.UnlockEvent
     
    EventType.WaveEvent
     
    EventType.WinEvent
     
    EventType.WithdrawEvent
    Called when the player withdraws items from a block.
    EventType.WorldLoadEvent
    Called when a game begins and the world is loaded.

    SectorInfo.ExportStat
     
    SpawnGroup
    A spawn group defines spawn information for a specific type of unit, with optional extra information like weapon equipped, ammo used, and status effects.

    Class for various team-based utilities.

    Represents a block made by this team that was destroyed somewhere on the map.
